divs: sighting detailsa friend and i saw a light moving across the sky while talking outside as i was leaving that we thought might be a satellite b\c it seemed too high to be a plane and we didn���t see any flashing lights. it seemed pretty bright. we then noticed, as it was passing overhead, no noise and it was shifting left and right in flight. it was not flying straight like a plane or satellite would. we could not figure out what it was. it traveled over the arvada, co area toward the north-northwest until we lost site. we also looked back where it had come from and noticed a similar light that was hovering. about the same altitude, brightness, shape, etc., but it just hovered. it was shifting erratically from left to right, up and down, but it generally remained in the same spot in the sky. we watched it for close to 30-45 minutes expecting it to do something, but it just continued doing what we had observed. we left at that point but have no idea what we had just seen.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Arvada
There were no other sightings in Arvada on or around July 4th 2008
Summary: 2 bright lights. 1 hovered erratically, the other flew across the sky in NNW direction while swerving.
